title: How Many Episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth Are Left?
description: Peacock’s highly anticipated drama series Lockerbie: A Search for Truth has premiered. The gripping story centers on the tragic explosion of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, where Dr. Jim Swire, who lost his daughter Flora, seeks justice with his wife, Jane. Fans are eager to know the total number of episodes and the series […] The post How Many Episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth Are Left? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Get the latest on Lockerbie: A Search for Truth and find out how many episodes are left and when the series finale will air.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Peacock’s highly anticipated drama series Lockerbie: A Search for Truth has premiered. The gripping story centers on the tragic explosion of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, where Dr. Jim Swire, who lost his daughter Flora, seeks justice with his wife, Jane. Fans are eager to know the total number of episodes and the series finale date. Here’s the latest on the episode release schedule for Lockerbie: A Search for Truth. How many episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth are left after Episode 1? After Episode 1, four episodes remain in Lockerbie: A Search for Truth. Lockerbie: A Search for Truth is a five-episode true-story TV series set to debut on January 2, 2025, at 9 p.m. ET. This highly anticipated biography features Colin Firth in the lead role of Jim Swire, a doctor whose daughter lost her life in the tragic attack. The series follows his quest for answers about the events surrounding that fateful day. When does Lockerbie: A Search for Truth’s finale come out? The finale is set to release on Thursday, January 30, 2025. Lockerbie: A Search for Truth airs every Thursday, concluding on January 30, 2025. The narrative revolves around the devastating incident of December 1988, when a bomb brought down Pan Am Flight 103 just 38 minutes after takeoff as it passed over Lockerbie, Scotland. The horrific act claimed the lives of all 243 passengers and 16 crew members on board. Additionally, debris from the aircraft fell into a nearby residential area, killing 11 more individuals. In the aftermath, Jim Swire and his wife, Jane, embarked on a determined journey for justice for the victims, including their beloved daughter, Flora. The series is a co-production by Sky Studios, Peacock, and Carnival Films, drawing inspiration from Jim Swire’s book. The cast includes Colin Firth, Catherine McCormack, Sam Troughton, Rosanna Adams, Nabil Al Raee, Harry Redding, and others. Watch all episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth on BBC, Sky Atlantic, and Peacock.
html:
Peacock’s highly anticipated drama series Lockerbie: A Search for Truth has premiered. The gripping story centers on the tragic explosion of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, where Dr. Jim Swire, who lost his daughter Flora, seeks justice with his wife, Jane. Fans are eager to know the total number of episodes and the series finale date.

Here’s the latest on the episode release schedule for Lockerbie: A Search for Truth.

How many episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth are left after Episode 1?

After Episode 1, four episodes remain in Lockerbie: A Search for Truth.

Lockerbie: A Search for Truth is a five-episode true-story TV series set to debut on January 2, 2025, at 9 p.m. ET. This highly anticipated biography features Colin Firth in the lead role of Jim Swire, a doctor whose daughter lost her life in the tragic attack. The series follows his quest for answers about the events surrounding that fateful day.

When does Lockerbie: A Search for Truth’s finale come out?

The finale is set to release on Thursday, January 30, 2025.

Lockerbie: A Search for Truth airs every Thursday, concluding on January 30, 2025. The narrative revolves around the devastating incident of December 1988, when a bomb brought down Pan Am Flight 103 just 38 minutes after takeoff as it passed over Lockerbie, Scotland. The horrific act claimed the lives of all 243 passengers and 16 crew members on board. Additionally, debris from the aircraft fell into a nearby residential area, killing 11 more individuals.

In the aftermath, Jim Swire and his wife, Jane, embarked on a determined journey for justice for the victims, including their beloved daughter, Flora. The series is a co-production by Sky Studios, Peacock, and Carnival Films, drawing inspiration from Jim Swire’s book.

The cast includes Colin Firth, Catherine McCormack, Sam Troughton, Rosanna Adams, Nabil Al Raee, Harry Redding, and others.

Watch all episodes of Lockerbie: A Search for Truth on BBC, Sky Atlantic, and Peacock.
